00072       class init_visitor :public CycleDetector {
00073       public:
00077        explicit init_visitor(TICK final)
00078          :m_final(final) {}
00083        init_visitor(init_visitor const &other) 
00084          :CycleDetector(other), m_final(other.m_final) {}
00086        virtual ~init_visitor() {}
00087        
00103        void finish_vertex(graph::reactor_id r, graph const &g) {
00104          if( is_valid(r) )
00105            r->initialize(m_final);
00106        }
00107       protected:
00113        TICK m_final;
00114 
00115       };
00116 
00139       class sync_scheduller :public CycleDetector {
00140       public:
00150        typedef std::list<graph::reactor_id> reactor_queue;
00151 
00165        explicit sync_scheduller(reactor_queue &sync_order)
00166          :m_sync(&sync_order) {}
00173        sync_scheduller(sync_scheduller const &other) 
00174          :CycleDetector(other), m_sync(other.m_sync) {}
00176        virtual ~sync_scheduller() {}
00177 
00187        void discover_vertex(graph::reactor_id r, graph const &g) {
00188          // First encounter with r :
00189          //   - inform him that a new tick has started 
00190          //        this will result on dispatching its goals if possible
00191          if( is_valid(r) )
00192            r->newTick();
00193        }
00194        
00205        void finish_vertex(graph::reactor_id r, graph const &g) {
00206          // Completed all the vertex below :
00207          //   - this the next candidate to be synchronized
00208          if( is_valid(r) )
00209            m_sync->push_back(r);
00210        }
00211 
00212       private:
00214        reactor_queue               *m_sync;
00215 
00216        sync_scheduller(); // no code in purpose
00217       };
00218 
00219     }
00220   }
00221 }

00232 TICK Agent::initialTick(Clock *clk) {
00233   return (NULL==clk)?0:clk->initialTick();
00234 }

00238 Agent::Agent(Symbol const &name, TICK final, Clock *clk) 
00239   :graph(name, initialTick(clk)), 
00240    m_clock(clk), m_finalTick(final) {
00241   m_proxy = new AgentProxy(*this);
00242   add_reactor(m_proxy);
00243 }

00245 Agent::Agent(std::string const &file_name, Clock *clk) 
00246   :m_clock(clk) {
00247   updateTick(initialTick(m_clock));
00248   m_proxy = new AgentProxy(*this);
00249   add_reactor(m_proxy);
00250   loadConf(file_name);
00251 }

00254   :m_clock(clk) {
00255   updateTick(initialTick(m_clock));

00257   add_reactor(m_proxy);

00262 Agent::~Agent() {
00263   m_proxy = NULL;
00264   clear();
00265   if( NULL!=m_clock )
00266     delete m_clock;
00267 }

00269 // observers :
00270 
00271 bool Agent::missionCompleted() {
00272   if( count_reactors()<=1 ) {
00273     // If there's only one reactior left it is probably
00274     // my AgentProxy => no real reactor available
00275     syslog()<<"No reactor left.";
00276     return true;
00277   }
00278   return getCurrentTick()>=m_finalTick;
00279 }

00281 // manipulators :
00282 
00283 bool Agent::setClock(Clock *clock) {
00284   if( NULL==m_clock ) {
00285     m_clock = clock;
00286     updateTick(initialTick(m_clock));
00287     return true;
00288   } else {
00289     delete clock;
00290     return false;
00291   }
00292 }

00294 void Agent::loadPlugin(rapidxml::xml_node<> &pg) {
00295   Symbol name = parse_attr<Symbol>(pg, "name");
00296   m_pg->load(name);
00297 }

00299 void Agent::loadConf(rapidxml::xml_node<> &config) {
00300   if( !is_tag(config, "Agent") )
00301     throw XmlError(config, "Not an Agent node");
00302   // Extract attributes
00303   try {
00304     Symbol name = parse_attr<std::string>(config, "name");
00305     if( name.empty() )
00306       throw XmlError(config, "Agent name is empty.");
00307     set_name(name);
00308     m_finalTick = parse_attr<TICK>(config, "finalTick");
00309     if( m_finalTick<=0 ) 
00310       throw XmlError(config, "agent life time should be greater than 0");
00311   } catch(bad_string_cast const &e) {
00312     throw XmlError(config, e.what());
00313   }
00314   // Now iterate through the sub-tags 
00315   ext_iterator const c_start(config, "config"); 
00316   ext_iterator iter; 
00317 
00318   if( !c_start.valid() )
00319     throw XmlError(config, "Agent node do not have sub nodes.");
00320 
00321   // First load the plugins :
00322   syslog()<<"Loading plug-ins...";
00323   iter = c_start;
00324   if( is_tag(*iter, "Plugin") )
00325     loadPlugin(*iter);
00326   for( iter.next("Plugin"); iter.valid(); iter.next("Plugin") )
00327     loadPlugin(*iter);
00328 
00329   
00330   // Look for A clock : Note only the first clock found is used
00331   if( NULL==m_clock ) {
00332     SingletonUse<Clock::xml_factory> clk_f;
00333     iter = c_start;
00334     clk_f->iter_produce(iter, m_clock);
00335   }
00336   // List the reactors available for helping the user :
00337   SingletonUse<xml_factory> reactor_f;
00338   
00339   // First look for the reactor types available
00340   std::list<Symbol> reactors_types;
00341 
00342   reactor_f->getIds(reactors_types);
00343   if( reactors_types.empty() ) {
00344     syslog()<<"ERROR : no reactor types available.";
00345   } else {
00346     // Display the list of reactor types
00347     std::ostringstream oss;
00348 
00349     while( !reactors_types.empty() ) {
00350       oss<<"\n\t- "<<reactors_types.front();
00351       reactors_types.pop_front();
00352     }
00353     syslog()<<"Loading reactors; available reactor types are :"<<oss.str();
00354 
00355     iter = c_start;
00356     add_reactors(iter);                     
00357   }
00358   
00359   // Now load and post the goals 
00360   syslog()<<"load initial goals of the agent";
00361   iter = c_start;
00362   sendRequests(iter);
00363 }
00364 
00365 void Agent::loadConf(std::string const &file_name) {
00366   bool found;
00367   std::string name = manager().use(file_name, found);
00368   if( !found ) {
00369     name = manager().use(file_name+".cfg", found);
00370     if( !found )
00371       throw ErrnoExcept("Unable to locate "+file_name);
00372   }
00373   rapidxml::file<> file(name.c_str());
00374   rapidxml::xml_document<> doc;
00375   doc.parse<0>(file.data());
00376   rapidxml::xml_node<> *root = doc.first_node();
00377   if( NULL==root ) 
00378     throw TREX::utils::Exception(std::string("Configuration file : \"")+
00379                              file_name+"\" is empty.");
00380   loadConf(*root);
00381 }
00382 
00383 void Agent::initComplete() {
00384   if( getName().empty() ) 
00385     throw AgentException(*this, "Agent has no name :"
00386                       " You probably forgot to initialize it.");
00387   if( NULL==m_clock )
00388     throw AgentException(*this, "Agent is not connected to a clock");
00389   // Complete the init for the reactors and check that there's no cycle
00390   details::init_visitor init(m_finalTick);
00391   boost::depth_first_search(me(), boost::visitor(init));
00392   
00393   // Check for missing timelines 
00394   for(timeline_iterator it=timeline_begin(); timeline_end()!=it; ++it) 
00395     if( !(*it)->owned() ) 
00396       syslog("WARN")<<"Timeline \""<<(*it)->name()<<"\" has no owner.";
00397   
00398 
00399   // Create initial graph file
00400   std::string graph_dot = manager().file_name("reactors.dot");
00401   std::ofstream dotf(graph_dot.c_str());
00402   
00403   graph_names_writer gn;
00404   boost::write_graphviz(dotf, me(), gn, gn);
00405   syslog()<<"Initial graph logged in \"reactors.dot\".";
00406 
00407 
00408   // start the clock
00409   m_clock->doStart();
00410   syslog("START")<<"\t=========================================================";
00411 }
00412 
00413 void Agent::run() {
00414   initComplete();
00415   while( doNext() );
00416   syslog()<<"Mission completed."<<std::endl;
00417 }
00418 
00419 
00420 void Agent::synchronize() {
00421   details::sync_scheduller::reactor_queue queue;
00422   details::sync_scheduller sync(queue);
00423 
00424   // Identify synchronization order while notifying of the new tick
00425   boost::depth_first_search(me(), boost::visitor(sync));
00426   // Execute synchronization
00427   //  - could be done with a dfs but we choose for now to do it using the
00428   //  output list of sync_scheduller to avoid a potentially costfull graph
00429   //  exploration.
00430   while( !queue.empty() ) {
00431     reactor_id r = queue.front();
00432     queue.pop_front();
00433     // Update timelines for r
00434     r->doNotify();
00435 
00436     // synchronization
00437     if( r->doSynchronize() ) {
00438       double wr = r->workRatio();
00439 
00440       if( !std::isnan(wr) ) {
00441        // this reactor has deliberation :
00442        //   - add it to the edf scheduler
00443        m_edf.insert(std::make_pair(wr, r));
00444       }
00445     } else {
00446       // r failed => kill the reactor
00447       kill_reactor(r);
00448     }
00449   }
00450 }
00451 
00452 bool Agent::executeReactor() {
00453   if( m_edf.empty() )
00454     return false;
00455   else {
00456     reactor_id r = m_edf.begin()->second;
00457     m_edf.erase(m_edf.begin());
00458     r->step();
00459 
00460     double wr = r->workRatio();
00461     if( !std::isnan(wr) ) {
00462       m_edf.insert(std::make_pair(wr, r));
00463       return true;
00464     }
00465     return !m_edf.empty();
00466   }
00467 }
00468     
00469 bool Agent::doNext() {
00470   if( missionCompleted() ) {
00471     if( empty() )
00472       syslog()<<"No more reactor active.";    
00473     syslog("END")<<"\t=========================================================";
00474     return false;
00475   }
00476   synchronize();
00477   
00478   while( m_clock->getNextTick()==getCurrentTick() && executeReactor() );
00479   while( m_clock->getNextTick()==getCurrentTick() )
00480     m_clock->sleep();
00481   
00482   updateTick(m_clock->getNextTick());
00483 
00484   return true;
00485 }
00486 
00487 void Agent::sendRequest(goal_id const &g) {
00488   if( !has_timeline(g->object()) )
00489     syslog("WARN")<<"Posting goal on a unknnown timeline \""<<g->object()<<"\".";
00490   m_proxy->postRequest(g);
00491 }
00492 
00493 size_t Agent::sendRequests(ext_iterator &iter) {
00494   size_t ret = 0;
00495   if( iter.valid() ) {
00496     for(iter = iter.find_tag("Goal"); iter.valid(); iter = iter.next("Goal") ) {
00497       sendRequest(*iter);
00498       ++ret;
00499     }
00500     syslog()<<ret<<" goal"<<(ret>1?"s":"")<<" loaded.";
00501   } else 
00502     syslog()<<"There's no tag in this file.";
00503   return ret;
00504 }
